mapper.insert: insert into tbl_storage (user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number) values( #{userId}, #{storageName}, #{storagePhone}, #{storageTitle}, #{storageSize}, #{storagePrice}, #{storageAddress}, #{storageAddressDetail}, #{storageUseDate}, #{storageEndDate}, #{storageAddressNumber} )
mapper.select:
select storage_id, user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_address_number, storage_use_date, storage_end_date from tbl_storage
order by storage_id
desc
limit #{page.criteria.startRow}, #{page.criteria.amount}

select u.user_id, user_identification, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status, storage_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number from tbl_user u join tbl_storage s on u.user_id = s.user_id
order by storage_id
desc
limit #{page.criteria.startRow}, #{page.criteria.amount}

select u.user_id, user_identification, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status, storage_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number from tbl_user u join tbl_storage s on u.user_id = s.user_id where storage_id = #{storageId} order by storage_id desc

select storage_id, u.user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status from ( select user_id, user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status from tbl_user ) u join ( select storage_id, user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number from tbl_storage
) r on u.user_id = r.user_id having storage_id = #{storageId}

select r.storage_id, u.user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status, cs.review_count from ( select user_id, user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status from tbl_user ) u join ( select storage_id, user_id, storage_name, storage_phone,storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number from tbl_storage
) r on u.user_id = r.user_id join ( select ifnull(count(r.review_id), 0) as review_count, s.storage_id from tbl_storage s left join tbl_review r on s.storage_id = r.storage_id group by s.storage_id ) cs on cs.storage_id = r.storage_id
storage_size like concat('%', #{size}, '%')
order by storage_id desc
order by storage_price desc, storage_id desc
order by review_count desc, storage_id desc
limit #{page.criteria.startRow}, #{page.criteria.amount}

select storage_id, u.user_id, storage_name, storage_phone, storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status from ( select user_id, user_identification, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_address_detail, user_gender, user_birth, user_name, user_random_key, user_status from tbl_user ) u join ( select storage_id, user_id, storage_name, storage_phone,storage_title, storage_size, storage_price, storage_address, storage_address_detail, storage_use_date, storage_end_date, storage_address_number from tbl_storage ) r on u.user_id = r.user_id order by storage_id desc

select u.user_id, s.storage_id, s.storage_title, s.storage_price, count(r.review_id) from tbl_user u join tbl_storage s on u.user_id = s.user_id join tbl_review r on s.storage_id = r.storage_id group by u.user_id, s.storage_id, s.storage_title, s.storage_price order by count(r.review_id) desc
